unnormalised: Hey folks! Crop insurance, especially after that 2023 monsoon, is crucial, no? Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps a lot. My khet in Haryana suffered badly. Any tips on navigating the claim process? Seems complicated. Need it before Diwali, 12/11/2024! Applied on 20/06/2024, still waiting. Rs. 5000 loss at least! Maybe Krishi Vigyan Kendra can help at 15:00 hrs? Jai Kisan!
normalised: Hey folks! Crop insurance, especially after that two thousand and twenty three monsoon, is crucial, no? Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helps a lot. My khet in Haryana suffered badly. Any tips on navigating the claim process? Seems complicated. Need it before Diwali, twelfth november two thousand and twenty four! Applied on twentieth june two thousand and twenty four, still waiting. Rupee five thousand loss at least! Maybe Krishi Vigyan Kendra can help at three p.m.? Jai Kisan!
